captions.text: Come here, come here baby girl

Come here, come here

I'm going to get that woman
Why are you up so high?
They look even better today (Help me)
I'm going to show you now
Who do you think you are
You know, you're so hot you drive me mad
I thought this over a hundred times
Over and over and over and over
to play with my heart like this
Come here, come here baby girl
Where are you, where are you, to my world

Come here, come here
I'll give it all
